name: immutablestack

scripts.b_bash: mkdir -p .build && cp start_macos.sh dev_kit_macos.sh versions.sh gen_toolkit.sh .build/
scripts.build: tsc && npm run b_genhandle && npm run b_genfile && npm run b_init && npm run b_bash
scripts.zip: VERSION="v0.1.1"; HBREW_PATH=$(eval echo ~)/git/homebrew-immutable; tar -czvf ImmutableStack-$VERSION.tar.gz -C .build . && mv -f ImmutableStack-$VERSION.tar.gz "$HBREW_PATH"
scripts.p: npm run build && npm run zip

author: macioa
description: Toolkit for working with the Immutable Stack (elixir/phoenix + react/redux)
